Irrigation Scheduling

Irrigation Scheduling Options:

  • CROPWAT and CLIMWAT (FAO)
  • BISm.xls (UC Davis)

灌溉调度选项:

  • CROPWAT and CLIMWAT (FAO)
  • BISm.xls (UC Davis)
Comparisons CROPWAT BISm.XLS 比较 CROPWAT/CLIMWAT BISm.xls
Ease of Use A Little Easier A Bit More Complicated 易于使用 轻松一点 更复杂
Weather Data Used 10-Day Averages Daily 气象资料使用 采用平均值从10天 每日
Number Fields Scheduled Multiple Single 可以预定场数 多种 单
Primary Purpose

Improve irrigation in developing countries

 Teach irrigation scheduling 主要用途 改善灌溉发展中国家 教灌溉时机和调度

Comments on models:

  • There is a small error in the ETo calculation of CROPWAT because the data from CLIMWAT only uses the mean relative humidity and not the maximum and minimum relative humidity.
  • BISm.xls is somewhat better in terms of its estimate of effective rainfall because it uses daily rather than 10-day averaged data. However, unless there is a lot of rainfall, the effective rainfall part is not so important; especially since it is unlikely that the users will have an on-site rain gauge.

在车型点评：

  • 有一个在ETo计算CROPWAT的小错误，因为从CLIMWAT数据只使用平均相对湿度，而不是最大和最小相对湿度。
  • BISm.xls是估计有效降雨，因为它使用的日常，而不是10天的平均数据更好。然而，除非有大量的降雨，有效降雨部分不是那么重要，特别是因为它是不太可能的用户将有现场雨量计。
